remarks: The permutation sign of the transposition for a pair.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Dec-2018.)
statement:
psgnprfval.0 $e |- D = { 1 , 2 } $.
psgnprfval.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
psgnprfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
psgnprfval.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
psgnprfval.n $e |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) $.
psgnprfval2 $p |- ( N ` { <. 1 , 2 >. , <. 2 , 1 >. } ) = -u 1 $.
